main event: On 3 August 1965, a blue-white object was observed heading south over Honolulu, Hawaii.
interesting points: The object was reported by United Airlines personnel and Honolulu Control Tower staff., The object appeared to be a satisfactory celestial observation., There were multiple sightings in the Hawaiian area over the same time period., On 2 August 1965, another bright light was observed moving rapidly and then hovering for a few seconds., On 5 August, two pilots saw a bright light that appeared to descend steeply and was thought to be related to a U.S. space operation.
witness description: United Airlines personnel, Honolulu Control Tower personnel, and a family living in Wahiawa.
